line_1: What banker stopt payment with evil intention,
line_2: And twenty more things much too tedious to mention.

line_1: Till Jove to the Gods signified his intention
line_2: In a speech that he made 'em too tedious to mention;

line_1: Are wrote with much the same Intention;
line_2: And modern Plays, that I could mention,

line_1: I'm sure will answer my intention.
